data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea engelmannii (Engelmann spruce) from sample SILVER-61

Exposition N, Slope 35 deg, Geology: Granit anstehend, Schutt, Tree line 3580 m, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 50%, Vegatation type: Heterogen. Meistens tiefgründig + feucht, Film number: 754A
